creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: circular tray adorned only at rim by six sprouting seedlings, set equally around rim and joined by stems to each other at outer rim, scallop design at edge of rim before transition to basin; part of same set as .27.1,2 bowls
markings: [STERLING] /(crown)/oval [GEORG JENSEN] [232] oval [GI/925/S]/ [J] at edge of bottom; engraved at edge of bottom: [TO MARGARET LUDWIG FROM R.U. AND MARGARET GRAHAM]
title: Tray or charger
